name: Project Time Squared
description:
Project Time Squared is a puzzle game about a tiny robot Karel who boots up in an old ruined facility and must find his way out using strange devices called Time Dilation Generators™. These generators create field of energy inside of which time moves back to a point 100 years ago. Karel can use this effect in order to pass obstacles in his way and to bring objects from the past to help him progress in the present.

Created as a semestral project at university. It serves as a prototype of our vision, on which we'll be working on in the future.

Game Designer, Programmer - Honza Szlauer: https://twitter.com/bearinyourheart

Programmer - Antonín Holík:  https://twitter.com/TondaFSCZ

Graphics - Lucie Tvarohová: https://twitter.com/LucyTvar
